description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

platform_features.name: Powerful APIs
platform_features.description: Access to APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

platform_features.name: Developer Services
platform_features.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive range of Open APIs for Shopee's ecommerce processes
Can develop software tailored to business needs and integrate systems with Shopee

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation.
